casebody.data:
State
v.
William Edward Godwin, III 167PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 10, 2017 M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Godwin, William Edward (III). Teresa L. Townsend, Assistant Attorney General, Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of January 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of January 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 18th day of January 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
